revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Simultaneous Dual-N Band Wireless Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = https://www.linksys.com/us/support-product?pid=01t80000003K7dYAAS |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Linksys_WRT610N_v2 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = Supported |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Linksys |model = WRT610N |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = CTG1 |fcc_id = Q87-WRT610NV2 |icid = 3839A-WRT610NV2 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4718A1; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 480 <!-- 480/ 533 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Eon;EN29LV640B; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS5162FFR; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53115; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:25:9C, 68:7F:74 |oui = 00:25:9C, 68:7F:74
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = CyberTAN |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT,OpenWRT,TomatoUSB
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/29/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 745883585205 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B001AZ01EO |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = eth1 (wl0) |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = 17 |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = eth2 (wl1) |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4322; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = 16 |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "3763-40300105R" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :WRT610N v2 Serial No (S/N) appear to start with '''CTG1'''.
==Links of Interest== ===Wikis=== *[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linksys_routers ''Linksys routers'' page on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt610n ''WRT610N'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] - OpenWRT works, you will need to build :it with broadcom-wl to achieve full speed and make use of both radios.
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=33836 ''WRT610N'' thread on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=54216 ''WRT610N - Status'' thread on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=137565 ''Change your 610n V2 into an E3000 - Amended'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=380273 ''Unbrick/Install WRT610N v1&v2 using TFTP'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] :(label shot, 00:25:9C OUI)
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== *[http://vectormm.net/routers/other-routers/59-vosstanovlenie-linksys-wrt-610n-cherez.html ''Linksys WRT-610N Serial Recovery'' on '''VectorMM''']
